But didn't the robots Transform into Robots in Gobots. Doug also said 
that it was a ripoff of Transformers. And who here thinks it was 
stupid to make everyone except Rhinox a Transmetal (unless you count 
Tankor)? Also wasn't stupid the way in Robots in Disguise they call 
out there attacks (the only problem with the show)?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: Once again, no.  Beast Wars is an American/Canadian creation, 
from 
> Mainframe Entertainment. Same thing goes for Beast Machines.  Your 
cousins 
> boyfriend probably mistook Silverbolt for someone else since he has 
never 
> been in command.  Robots in Disguise originated in Japan, being the 
only 
> Japanese Transformers series so far to come to our shores. Gobots is 
> COMPLETELY UNRELATED to Transformers.  It was a rival show and 
toyline in the 
> 80s, but Transformers was infinitely more popular(and better).
